#summary (./wikt_parser/doc) How to create, edit and load empty Wiktionary parsed database into MySQL.
#labels Phase-Implementation,MySQL,MRD,parsing

This step should be done before the parsing of the Wiktionary database (see [GettingStartedWiktionaryParser Getting started with Wiktionary parser]).

= MySQL =

{{{
mysql$ CREATE DATABASE enwikt20100824_parsed;
mysql$ USE enwikt20100824_parsed
mysql$ SOURCE D:\all\projects\java\synonyms\wikokit\wikt_parser\doc\wikt_parsed_empty.sql
mysql$ GRANT ALL ON enwikt20100824_parsed.* TO javawiki@'%';
}}}

= Details =

  * Edit `wikt_parsed_empty.mwb` file in [MySQLWorkbench MySQL Workbench], export it to `wikt_parsed_empty.sql`
  * Make substitution in `wikt_parsed_empty.sql` in VIM by RE: 
{{{
%s/`mydb`\.//g
}}}
  * Create DB in MySQL, e.g. `ruwikt20090122_parsed`
  * `USE ruwikt20090122_parsed`
  * `SOURCE wikt_parsed_empty.sql`
